## Source: amazon-inspector (ec2ff3c7a16e539813080b53ccec2b3531078fed7382156c676025c1188b9c7c)
The package payments-notifications was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (9c5b0d60c2bb18c0a072118e86869399843cb27d5642927e3d29c1567c968f18)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'payments-notifications' @ 2.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
